name: Make-Ahead Breakfast Bars
author: Jackie
summary: I like to make a batch of these and then cut them and wrap single servings in foil to have handy in the freezer for the week. Much cheaper than the freezer breakfasts from the store and you can basically add/substitute whatever ingredients you want or have handy.
ingredients: 1 cup shredded Cheddar-Monterey Jack cheese blend
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease an 8x11-inch casserole dish with cooking spray
Mix hash browns, eggs, ham, Cheddar-Jack cheese, onion powder, salt, and pepper together
Pour mixture into the prepared dish
Shake dish gently from side to side to level out ingredients
Bake, uncovered, in the preheated oven until top starts to brown, about 40 minutes
